other_tests.findings: Gleason 8 prostate adenocarcinoma in 6 out of 6 cores (80% involvement). Immunohistochemistry showed abundant androgen receptor expression in all cancer cells, but no estrogen or progesterone receptor expression.
Gleason 8 prostate adenocarcinoma in 6 out of 6 cores (80% involvement).
PSA level decreased by 68% to 77 ng/mL after 6 weeks.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After completing antiandrogen treatment in week 35, PSA level was 0.4 ng/mL.

other_tests.findings: PSA level decreased to 4.6 ng/mL after radiation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Before radiation, PSA was 77 ng/mL; after radiation, it further decreased to 0.4 ng/mL.
